holidays.name: World Stress Awareness Day
holidays.description: A day to recognize the impact of stress on our health and well-being and to promote ways to manage and reduce stress.
holidays.origin: Established by the International Stress Management Association in the early 1990s to raise awareness about stress-related health problems.
